Episodes.Title: Reconstruction
Episodes.Plot: Following the battle of New Bern, Jericho begins the rebuilding process, while the Cheyenne government shows a particular interest in the town. While the dispute between Jericho and New Bern is being sorted out by the Cheyenne government, Heather returns. Meanwhile, an old friend of Rob comes to Jericho.

Episodes.Title: Condor
Episodes.Plot: Jericho gets ready for a very important visitor from the new Cheyenne government.  Meanwhile, Hawkins and Chavez work to find the new leaderships secrets.
Episodes.GuestStars: Chris Kramer, Kyle Bornheimer, Elizabeth Pan Pan, J. Carlos Ragas, George Newbern, Jim Devoti, Lance Guest, Mac Brandt, Daniel Benzali, Abigail Marlowe

Episodes.Title: Jennings & Rall
Episodes.Plot: The deadly Hudson River virus hits the area and a vaccine is being withheld from the citizens by a government official. Jake and the Rangers find a way to protect Jericho.
Episodes.GuestStars: Aasif Mandvi, Kevin Fry-Bowers, Daniel Benzali, Michael Broderick

Episodes.Title: Oversight
Episodes.Plot:
Hawkins receives a call on from someone who knows who he is, where he is and lets Hawkins know exactly when he'll be caught.
Meanwhile, tragedy strikes.
Episodes.GuestStars: Candace Bailey, Geno Monterio, Patrick Rowe, Dylan Kenin, Brad Fleischer, Russ Hunt, D.B. Sweeney, Debbie Jaffe

Episodes.Title: Termination For Cause
Episodes.Plot: Jake and the Rangers take on Goetz and Ravenwood while a Jericho Ranger makes a choice that will alter his life. Meanwhile, an old friend comes to warn Heather that her loyalties to Major Beck have placed her in serious danger.
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael Rubenstone, Brad Raider, Aasif Mandvi, Link Baker, Nick Hoffa, David Meunier, Geno Monterio, Bill Tangradi, Patrick Rowe, Terrel Clayton

Episodes.Title: Sedition
Episodes.Plot: Following the Rangers' decision to take justice into their own hands, Major Beck goes to extreme measures to prove he's in complete control of the town, while Hawkins receives a call from Chavez telling him that it's time to transport the bomb.
Episodes.Writer: Carol Barbee, Stephen Scaia, Matthew Federman
Episodes.GuestStars: Pamela Reed, David Huddleston, Geno Monterio, Jazz Raycole, Chris Kramer, David Michie, David Meunier, Glenn Davies, Michael Harrity, Mark Engelhardt, Sterling D. Ardrey

Episodes.Title: Patriots And Tyrants
Episodes.Plot: Jake and Hawkins have one chance to expose the conspiracy behind the Cheyenne government to the independent Texas administration. However, getting there proves to be the most difficult part of their plan.
Episodes.GuestStars: David Meunier, Timothy Omundson, Daniel Benzali, Chris Kramer, Xander Berkeley, Brian Tee, Geno Monteiro, John M. Jackson, Roxana Brusso, Rick Federman, Dennis Staroselsky, Dominic Hoffman, Laura Leyva, Holt Boggs
